mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.thumbnail, b.content, c.category_name, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date, b.board_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE board_id=#{boardId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id ASC) AS row, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date, b.board_id, u.users_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id ASC) AS row, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date, b.board_id, u.users_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id WHERE b.title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id ASC) AS row, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date, b.board_id, u.users_id FROM board b INNER JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id WHERE b.category_id = #{categoryId} OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id ASC) AS row, b.title, u.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date, b.board_id, u.users_id FROM board b INNER JOIN users u ON b.users_id = u.users_id WHERE b.category_id = #{categoryId} AND b.title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, thumbnail, content, users_id, category_id, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{usersId}, #{categoryId}, now(), now())
